Author: x24throwaway
Text: How old are you?   When you see a therapist, or if you keep engaged with the counsellor, maybe try to get some sessions with your mum there too.   My school counsellor was the one who told my mum about my ED, against my will. It went terribly, our relationship got really bad. I pushed her away, blocked her from all therapy sessions. Now there’s no way I ever let her in on anything in my life because I just can’t. Our relationship is pretty bad and it’s 11 years later.   You did the right thing imo and it was very brave of you.

Author: chassischuck
Text: You did the right thing but you should have told your counselor why you didnt tell your mom also tell your mom you didnt want to tell her   And tell her why honesty is the only thing that can keep relationships healthy if you want to be able to keep your mom around you when your older tell her now because otherwise itll become toxic
